item.title: Ansible 101
item.description: What is Ansible? Ansible is an open source configuration management tool offered by RedHat. WHy use Ansible? If you are working with any kind of remote compute at scale whether the platform is hosted within the Cloud or not Ansible is a core tool that you will need to familiarise yourself with. The open source tool only works with Linux based systems which makes up most of any remote platform.
